body: Maurício Caleiro at the blog Cinema e outras Artes [Cinema and Other Arts, pt] makes a critical analysis of the media coverage on the recent floods in the state of Rio de Janeiro taht so far killed almost 450 people. Alex Haubrich goes even further at the blog Jornalismo B and accuses [pt] the media of being  an  accomplice of the tragedy.
original_body: Maurício Caleiro at the blog Cinema e outras Artes [Cinema and Other Arts, pt] makes a critical analysis of the media coverage on the recent floods in the state of Rio de Janeiro taht so far killed almost 450 people. Alex Haubrich goes even further at the blog Jornalismo B and accuses [pt] the media of being an accomplice of the tragedy.
title: Brazil: Media and Floods

sentence: Maurício Caleiro at the blog Cinema e outras Artes [Cinema and Other Arts, pt] makes a critical analysis of the media coverage on the recent floods in the state of Rio de Janeiro taht so far killed almost 450 people.
Alex Haubrich goes even further at the blog Jornalismo B and accuses [pt] the media of being  an  accomplice of the tragedy.
